Summary: saw one outside of north window then founf over 15 in sky on 2nd look
Object Shape: Blimp, Bullet, Missile, Cylinder, Disc, Fireball, Oval, Sphere, Triangle
divs: Sighting Detailssetting and watching tv. in the living room looked out window and saw a bright yellow- flame type of light in the sky. thought it looked odd so I went outside to see what it was. then I was a formation with 15 in smaller formations of 3. the groups of 3 moved in different directions but maintained the same overall group movement. when I realized what I was seeing I ran up and woke my wife and both of us watched them for over 10 min before they all moved of to the east. they all changed shape. you could see beings in the lights. they were very bright.
